original_text: For the Lord taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.
korean_text: 여호와께서는 자기 백성을 기뻐하시며 겸손한 자를 구원으로 아름답게 하심이로다

sentences.original_text: For the Lord taketh pleasure in his people:
he will beautify the meek with salvation.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 구원으로 온유한 자를 아름답게 하리라.
